K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409a-4: 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409a-5: ston pa dus gcig na ser skya'i gzhi dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-0: n+ya gro @409b dha'i kun dga' ra ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-1: chu klung ro hi na'i 'gram na bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus ma 'ongs pa'i rgyal ba de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-3: khyed kyi rjes bstan blo brtan ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-5: spyan ldan yongs su rgyas par ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-6: bdag ni rab tu nyan par 'dod //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-7: gnas brtan zhus pa gsan nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-9: bsod nams phung po mi nyung ba'i //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-10: grags pa chen po mi pham pa'i //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-11: yon tan thams cad brjod mi nus //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-12: mdor bsdus nas ni legs bshad pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-13: phyogs gcig tsam ni bstan par bya //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-14: sh'a ri'i bu nyon nga yi tshig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-15: 'di ni bskal ba bzang po ste //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-16: skye ba bye ba'i lo ru ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-17: byams pa zhes pa'i ming nyid kyis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-18: rkang gnyis mchog gi sangs rgyas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-19: ji ltar nga 'das nas dang por dus lnga 'byung ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-21: bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-22: lung gi bar gyi dus dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-23: rtags tsam gyi bar gyi dus dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-24: sku gdung gi bar gyi dus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-25: de la 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-26: sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-27: lo stong phrag gcig gi nang du rtogs ba skyed par nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:409b-28: de song zhing song ba'i dus su /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-0: de rnams yod pa na 'bras bu'i bar gyi @410a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-1: dus med ces brjod bar mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-2: lhag ma ni rgyun du zhugs pa ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-3: de 'das nas 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-4: 'di ni 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya ba yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-5: bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus zhes bya ba ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-7: lhag mthong gi lam gyi 'bras bu bslab par mi nus par pham pa bzhi po bsrung bar nus pa tsam mo /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-8: song zhing song ba'i dus su /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-9: pham pa bzhi po de nyid bsrung ba tsam mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-10: pham pa bzhi po srung bar byed pa ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-11: dge slong rnams stong phrag gcig gi nang na brgya tsam yod na yang bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes mi bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-12: brgya'i nang na dge slong gcig tsam yod pa las sdom pa zhig pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-13: sha bi na bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-14: 'di ni bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-15: lung gi bar gyi dus zhes bya ba ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-16: sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab sde snod gsum po'i don mi go zhing sgra tsam klog pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-17: po ti yod pa'i bar ni lung gi bar gyi dus yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-18: song zhing song ba'i dus su rtsod pa'i dus kyi rgyal po rnams chos ma yin pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-19: blon po la sogs pa rnams kyang chos ma yin pa byed par 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410a-21: ljongs rnams kyang de bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-0: de rnams @410b kyis chos ma yin pa'i rgyu yis lha rnams char legs par mi 'bebs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-1: 'bru rnams legs par mi smin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-2: de rnams kyi 'bru ma smin pas dge slong gi dge 'dun la bza' ba ster mi nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-3: dge slong rnams kyis kha zas ma rnyed pas slob ma dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-4: yang slob rnams 'dzin par mi nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-5: song zhing song ba'i dus su lung gi dus dman pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-6: dang po ni rab tu byed pa chen po nyams par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-7: de nub nas ya ma kam gi tshigs su bcad pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-13: chos bsdu ba nub par 'gyur ba'i /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-14: chos mngon sde snod nub nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-15: mdo sde'i sde snod nub par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-16: de nas aam ga phyi ma'i sde pa nub par 'gyur ro; ;aam ga phyi ma'i sde pa nub nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-17: yang dag par ldan pa'i sde pa nub par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-19: ring po'i sde pa nub par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-20: ring po'i sde pa nub nas 'dul ba dang bcas pa'i skyes rabs gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-21: 'dul ba'i sde snod la yang ngo tsha dang ldan pa tsam 'dzin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-22: song zhing song ba'i dus su skyes pa'i rabs tsam yang 'dzin par mi nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-23: dang po thams cad sgrol gyi skyes pa'i rabs nub par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:410b-24: tha mar lo ma med pa'i skyes pa'i rabs nub par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411a-2: song zhing song ba'i dus su mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab kyi tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam dar bar byed na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411a-3: lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411a-4: gang zhig rgyal po chos la dad pa'i dus su glang po che'i rgyab tu gser gyi za ma tog gcig gzhag ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411a-5: nor stong phrag gcig de ru bcug nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gang gis shes pa des nor stong phrag de long zhes grong khyer gyi dbus su rol mo'i sgra lan gsum bsgrags nas de skad brjod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411a-6: de len par mi nus pa na nor stong phrag de rgyal po'i mdzod du yang 'jog go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411a-7: de'i dus ni lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa'i dus su 'gyur ro; ;'di ni lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa'i dus zhes bya ba yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411a-8: song zhing song ba'i dus su chos gos 'dzin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411a-10: gcer bu pa'i dge sbyong dang 'dra bar chag tshang ku ba'i snod /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411a-12: lag pa'i rtse mo la 'phyang ba'i tshul dang 'dra ba dang dra ba'i nang du khyer nas 'gro ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411a-13: song zhing song ba'i dus su gos dur smrig gis bdag la ci byed /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411a-14: cung zad tshos su byas pa'i dum bu lag pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-2: tshong la sogs pa byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-3: 'tsho ba'i phyir du spyod cing 'gro bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-4: de'i tshe yon ster cing dge 'dun gyi ched du de thams cad ster bar byed de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-7: dge 'dun gyi yon gyi 'bras bu ni grangs med par bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-8: song zhing song ba'i dus su 'di ci bdag gi don du dur smrig gi dum bu btogs nas dgon pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-9: nags tshal du skyur bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-10: de rnams kyi dus su rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i bar gyi dus nub par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-11: 'di ni rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa'i dus zhes bya ba yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-12: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa lo stong phrag lnga pa la rnyed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-13: bkur sti la sogs pa'i rnyed pa chung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-14: sku gdung rnams bsnyen bkur byed pa'i gnas su 'gro bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-15: song zhing song ba'i dus su gnas thams cad du bkur sti dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-17: bstan pa tha ma'i dus su klu'i yul dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-19: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gnas thams cad nas 'ongs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-20: sku gdung thams cad byang chub kyi snying po kho nar bsdus te sangs rgyas kyi sku ru gyur nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-21: gshin rje'i rdzu 'phrul du ma ston pa dang 'dra bar gzhan la ston no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-22: de'i gnas su sems can mir gyur pa'i ming yang med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:411b-23: stong phrag bcu'i lha'i 'jig rten gyi khor yug gi bar thams cad 'dus nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-1: pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-2: deng nas bzung nas mun nag tu gyur to zhes du bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-3: sku gdung thams cad la me'i khams langs nas de'i sku lus lhag ma med bar sreg par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-4: 'di ni sku gdung gi bar gyi dus nub ba zhes bya ba yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-5: de nas lo stong phrag lnga po 'dir bstan pa nub par gyur nas 'jig rten ba rnams la mi dge ba lhag par 'phel bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-7: mi rnams la ngo tsha dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-11: sring mo la sogs pa'i 'du shes med par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-13: ce spyang la sogs pa dang 'dra bar ngo tsha med par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-14: de nas mi dge ba la sbyor zhing tshe bri nas tshe lo bcu par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-15: lo lnga pa'i khye'u la lo lnga pa'i bu mo bag mar len no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-16: yang lo lnga'i nang nyid du bu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-20: de'i dus su mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-21: bskal pa bar ma gsum ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-22: mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-23: nad kyi bskal pa bar ma dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-24: mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-25: de la gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams la 'dod pa lhag par skyes nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-26: mu ge'i bskal pa bar mar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-27: gang gi tshe gti mug lhag bar che ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412a-28: nad kyi bskal pa bar mar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412b-0: gang gi tshe skyon du @412b gyur pa de'i dus su mtshon gyi bskal ba bar mar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412b-1: mu ge'i bskal pa bar mas sems can rnams brlag par byas nas yi dvags su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412b-2: nad kyi bskal ba bar mas sems can rnams brlag par byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412b-4: mtshon gyi bskal ba bar mas sems can rnams brlag par byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412b-6: de'i tshe mi rnams phan tshun du ri dvags kyi 'du shes dang bcas pa thob par gyur nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412b-9: spu gli'i so dang 'dra ba'i mtshon cha rnams bzung nas phan tshun gsod par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412b-10: de rnams su mkhas pa gang zhig des 'joms par thos nas ri'i sul la sogs par zhag bdun gyi kha zas bzung ste yib nas sdod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412b-11: de rnams su ma yib pa'i sems can lhag ma rnams phan tshun du brdeg cing gsod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412b-12: sa gzhi thams cad sha dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412b-14: de'i dus su sprin chen po 'dus nas char 'bebs par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412b-15: lha yis char phab pa'i rjes su dri zhim pa'i char 'bab cing 'bab par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412b-16: de rnams kyi dus su gnas thams cad yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:412b-17: gnas thams cad dag par gyur nas 'bras shun pa can char 'bab cing 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-0: 'bras shun pa can gyi char phab pa'i rjes su 'bras shun pa med pa'i char 'bab cing @413a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-3: rgyan gyi char 'bab cing 'bab par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-4: de'i mthar bus mo nub tsam gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab cing 'bab par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-5: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-6: dri zhim pa yi char 'bab cing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-7: shun can shun med 'bras kyi char //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-8: gos dang rgyan gyi char 'bab pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-9: de ltar dga' tshal mdzes pa bzhin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-10: rin chen sna bdun ma lus pa'i //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-11: de yi gnas su char 'bab bo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-12: gnas kun gang bar byas nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-13: de tshe dga' tshal mdzes pa bzhin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-14: de rnams 'das nas mi yib pa rnams 'thon te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-15: de rnams 'thon nas phan tshun du 'khyung pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-17: tshul khrims lnga la sogs pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams rjes su dran par byas nas rdzogs par rtsom mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-18: de nas tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams las skyes pa'i bu dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-19: bu mo tshe lo nyi shu par 'phel lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-20: de nas mi rnams la lhag par chos 'phel bas go rim bzhin du tshe 'phel te tshe lo grangs med par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-21: de'i tshe sems can rnams la rgas pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-23: de ltar sems can gzhan yang bag yod par 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-24: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni ci /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413a-25: zhes sems can rnams sems pa med do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-0: de nas tshe @413b grangs med pa rnams 'bri bar byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-1: sngar bzhin du bri nas tshe lo brgyad khri par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-2: de'i dus su 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du lha'i bu mo'i skal ba dang 'dra bar bud med dang; de ltar skyes pa dang bcas pas gang bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-3: lha'i char pa zla ba phyed du 'bab pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-6: nyin zhag phyed du sa'i bcud 'phel bar 'gyur ro; ;de'i tshes gzhi thams cad kyi cha mnyam pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-9: grong khyer la phyogs bzhi'i sgo dang ldan pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-10: grong khyer gyi dbus su dpag bsam gyi shing skye bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-12: de nas de yi grong khyer ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-13: sna tshogs tshong 'dus so so dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-14: legs par rab byung rdzing bu dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-15: dga' zhing rab tu gnas pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-16: dri ma med pa'i chu chen po //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-17: shin tu grangs zhing dri bzang ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-18: rnyog med mnyam zhing tshim pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-19: de nas rnyog ma yang dag gnas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-21: rba rlabs dang ni rnyog pa med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-22: t'a la'i phreng ba bdun gnas shing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-23: rin chen rang bzhin gyis khebs pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-24: lcags ri bdun dang ldan pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-25: grong khyer thams cad 'brel pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-26: rtsva can rgyal po'i pho brang ste //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-27: de tshe tog dang ldan par 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-28: grong khyer phyogs kyi sgo bzhi bu?//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:413b-29: dpag bsam shing ni skye bar 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-0: sngon po ser bo dmar po @414a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-2: dkar po rab tu gsal ba'i 'od //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-3: lha yi gos ni skye bar 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-4: lha yi drin gyis rgyan dang ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-5: longs spyod nye bar spyod pa rnams //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-6: thams cad steng nas 'phyang ba yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-7: de nas grong khyer dbus su ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-8: khang dmigs bzhi dang ldan ba yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-9: bsod nams las kyis grub pa ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-10: dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-11: ras bal ras ni bzang po dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-12: ko ma au dum wa ra'i ras //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-13: bsod nams las kyi grub pa ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-14: dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-15: mri ta ma ni lag pas rdung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-16: mu ra rdza dang aa lam bha //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-17: bsod nams las las byung ba ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-18: dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-19: dpung rgyan dag gi rgyan dang ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-20: dpung rgyan dang ni do shal dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-21: rin chen rang bzhin mgul pa'i rgyan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-22: bsod nams las las byung ba ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-23: dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-24: dpal ba kha yi rgyan dang ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-25: nor bu 'og pag lus la ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-26: bsod nams las las byung ba ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-27: dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-28: gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-29: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-30: bsod nams las las grub pa ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-31: dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-32: ma smos ma btab rang byung ba'i //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-33: bsod nams las kyis skyes pa ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414a-34: ma zhig spun med di ma med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-1: 'bras rnams bde bar btsos pa na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-2: mi rnams yongs su longs spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-3: de yi 'bras la zal zel med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-4: stong phrag brgya ni 'byung ba yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-5: 'bras kyi myu gu skye ba ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-6: thams cad du ni khyab par gnas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-7: 'bras snye re re skye ba la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-9: mi rnams kyi ni 'bras kyi dri //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-10: thams cad du ni longs spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-11: stong phrag gnyis kyi shing rta'i tshad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-12: shing rta brgya mi tshad tsam dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-13: shing rta sum cu rtsa dgu dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-14: bre chen bcu drug pa yi khal //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-15: de nas yang ni ku ba gnyis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-17: sa bon gcig la skye ba ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-18: skye bo rnams kyi bsod nams las //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-19: gang zhig tog dang ldan par gnas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-20: dung gi rgyal po mi yi bdag /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-21: de yi tshe ni de ltar 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-22: yon tan gyi ni dpung rgyan 'dzin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-23: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-24: bzhin legs rna ba'i rgyan dang ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-25: ha ri tsandan na lus la byugs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-26: ka shi'i gos ni mchog tu gyon //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-27: nor ni rgya cher mang ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-28: ting shag pi wang gis sad byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-29: rtag tu shin tu skyid pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-30: de yi lus dang sems bde zhing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-31: dpag tshad stong phrag bcu ru ni; ;'dzam bu gling ni gnas pa yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-32: tsher ma med cing shing med ba //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-33: mnyam zhing 'jam la sngo ba sangs gnas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:414b-34: de la nad ni gsum 'byung ste //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-0: @415a *// lnga brgya'i lo lon bud med ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-1: rgan dang gzhon pa bag mar len //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-2: gtan du gnyis ka bde ba yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-3: rtsod pa med par 'gyur ba yin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-4: 'phras bu lo tog phun sum tshogs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-5: 'khri shing gel ba shing gi tshal //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-6: rtsva ni sor bzhi pa ru skye //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-8: ha cang mi grang mi dro zhing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-9: char ni mnyam par 'bab ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-10: rlung ni shin tu chung ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-11: dus tshod mnyam par ldan pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-12: chu klung t'a la mi dman zhing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-13: de dang de yis yi cha //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-14: sa la rdo ni chud ldan la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-15: sran nag sran chung tshad tsam mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-16: mu tig 'dra bas yongs su gang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-17: rgyan rnams skyed mos tshal dang 'dra //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-19: grong dang grong rdal mang pos gang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-20: de dang de ni nye ba ru //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-21: 'od ma myug phran tshal bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-22: bya gag 'phur ba tsam nyid do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-23: dge zhing rgyas la rdzu 'phrul ldan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-24: lugs la nye bar 'tshe ba med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-25: rtag tu rtse zhing dga' ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-26: gcig tu bde bas tshim pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-27: rgyu skar bde bas bskor ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-28: dga' zhing tshim la rab tu dga'//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-29: bza'? dang btung ba mang po za //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-30: sha chang chu bzhin mang ba ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-31: lha yi pho brang lcang lo bzhin //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-32: khang bzang rgyal po'i pho brang ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-33: nyams dga' sgra mi snyan bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415a-34: 'dzam bu gling yang de bzhin gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415b-0: de'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' @415b byams pa 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa bcu drug dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415b-1: bskal pa 'bum phrag gcig lhag tsam du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415b-2: pha rol tu phyin pa sum cu rdzogs par byas nas thams cad sgrol bzhin du skye ba lhag ma'i lus sbyin pa chen po byas shing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415b-3: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415b-4: de'i lus zhig nas dga' ldan du skye ba rdzogs par byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415b-5: sangs rgyas byon par 'gyur ro zhes sgrogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415b-6: stong phrag bcu yi khor yug gi lha rnams ni sangs rgyas byon par 'gyur ro zhes dam 'cha'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415b-7: phyogs lngar gzigs te dga' ldan gyi lha'i chags rnams kyi 'khor gyis bskor la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415b-9: tog ldan zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang du dung gi rgyal po'i tshangs bzang mdun na 'don /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415b-10: bram ze'i rigs kyi tshangs ldan ma'i rum du zhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu g-yos so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415b-14: ri dvags rgyu ba'i gnas su ma'i rum nas 'thon te rim pa bzhin du shes pa dang ldan par gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:415b-15: bdag nyid kyi bsod nams kyis mthus sa gzhi brtol nas steng du 'ongs te rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi khang bzang bzhir rang nyid kyi lha bzhin du lha mo zla ba'i gdong can ma la sogs pa lha'i bu mo bzhin du bud med mang po de rnams dang 'grogs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416a-1: gcig lha bzhin du rjes su nyams su myong bar 'gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416a-2: de'i nyin par rab tu byung ba'i gzugs gcig mthong nas gser gyi gzeb la mi dga' ba seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin du dpal 'byor ma lus pa rdzogs pa rin po che'i khang bzang rnams la shin tu mi dga' bar gyur nas nges par 'byung ba'i 'dod pa skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416a-3: thams cad stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi lha rnams lha'i me tog la sogs pa lag pas blangs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416a-4: 'jig rten gyi 'khor lo 'di gcig tu 'dus te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416a-5: dung gi rgyal po la sogs pa'i skye bo chen pos bzung nas dri bzang dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416a-7: bdug spos la sogs pas khang bzang la bskor nas 'dug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416a-8: nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog lag pas bzung nas legs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416a-9: zhes bya ba'i sgra gcig tu 'byin par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416a-10: 'og min gyi bar du thams cad sgra gcig tu byed cing gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416a-11: de'i dus su rin po che'i khang bzang rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo ltar 'khor zhing nam mkha' la 'gro'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416a-12: zla ba nya ba la rgyu skar gyi phreng bas bskor ba bzhin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mo chen mo la sogs pa nam mkha' la bzhud do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416a-14: gang zhig sems dpa' chen po dang 'grogs nas 'gro ba'i sems kyis /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416a-15: de rnams kyis rang rang gi nam mkha' mthong ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-0: tshangs @416b pa chen pos dpag tshad gsum gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i gdugs dkar po 'dzin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-1: brgya byin lha'i rgyal pos dung la sogs pa bzung nas 'bud do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-3: skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa'i lha dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-4: mi'i tshogs kyis bskor nas khang bzang gi klu shing byang chub shing drung du gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-6: khru brgya nyi shu yal ga'i bar //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-7: yal ga'i mtho tshad de dang mnyam //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-9: rma bya'i gdugs bzhin mdzes pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-10: rtag tu rtse mor me tog gsal //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-11: lha yi dri bzang bsung ldang zhing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-12: ke sar phul lu gang tsam mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-13: me tog bzang po 'khor lo tsam //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-14: phyogs phyogs rlung gis khyer bar byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-15: dpag tshad bcu ru khyab pa 'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-16: steng gi me tog 'og tu lhung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-17: byang chub snying por me tog brtsegs /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-18: de'i dus su nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i bya rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshogs kyi sgra snyan pas mchod de /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-19: de ltar klu shing gi byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs te nam mkha' la 'phang zhing sa'i chu thams cad nyams dga' ba'i gnas su sdod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-20: de la zhag bdun du dpal gyi snying por dka' ba spyod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-21: tshangs pa chen pos blangs nas dngos po rnams bzung nas rab tu byung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-22: ji snyed pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang rab tu bang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-24: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:416b-25: bram ze'i rig byed mchog shes shing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-0: byams pa rab tu byung bar @417a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-2: de dang de ni rab tu byung //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-3: de la rab tu byung nas zla ba'i gdong can gyi lha mos shin tu dngar ba'i 'o thug phul lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-5: srod kyi thun la byang chub kyi shing drung du sa mnyam nas skyil krung gis ma pham pa bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-6: shar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs su gzigs shing bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-7: rim pa bzhin du dus la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so sor rtogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-9: 'khor ba'i skye bo ma lus pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-10: dug med pa ni btsal ba'i phyir //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-11: dug med khyim ni byed pa ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-12: yang yang skye ba sdug bsngal ba //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-13: khyim ni byed pa mthong bar 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-14: khyim ni gzhan ni byed pa med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-15: sdug bsngal thams cad gzhig pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-16: dug ldan khyim ni gzhig pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-17: sems kyi dug ni spong ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-18: sred pa zad nas grol bar 'gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-19: ched du brjod pa gsungs pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-20: byang chub kyi shing gi drung du zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzhugs nas tshangs pas gsol ba 'debs pa'i phyir /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-21: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ched du drang srong lhung ba'i gnas su gshegs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-22: de nas der gshegs pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-23: zhabs ni bteg dang bzhag pa na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-25: 'dab mnyam khru ni sum cu pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-26: 'dab chung khru ni nyi shu lnga //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-27: ge sar khru ni nyi shu pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417a-28: lte ba khru ni bcu drug pa //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-0: ge sar @417b rnams ni khyab par gnas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-1: padma'i mdzod spu thams cad du'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-2: stobs bcu pa'i 'od kyis nyin mor byed pa'i 'od zil gyis gnon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-4: mtshan mo mi byed bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-6: tho rangs bya rnams skad sgrogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-7: me tog kha zum pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-9: nyin mor shes par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-11: gang du chos ston par byed pa de dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-12: de ru chos kyi sgra sgrogs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-15: dbyangs dang dbyangs kyi tshad tsam mo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-16: gzi brjid gzi yi tshad rnams ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-17: bsod nams bsod nams kyi ni tshad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-18: shes rab shes rab kyi ni tshad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-19: grags pa grags pa yi ni tshad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-20: kha dog kha dog gi ni tshad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-21: chos ni chos rnams kyi ni tshad //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-22: de nas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bram ze dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-23: bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi tshangs pa rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i btung ba 'thung nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-24: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi mthu yis rnam pa brgya phrag du ma'i 'od zer 'phro zhing /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-25: rnam pa brgya phrag du ma'i mtshan rdzogs pa mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog dang ldan pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-26: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan par brgya phrag du ma'i sku mdog rnam pa du ma'i ya mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-27: brgya phrag du ma'i 'od zer de'i sku las 'thon par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:417b-28: de ni kha dog sngon po dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-1: btsod kyi mdog lta bu'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i sku mdog can no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-2: de'i sku lus la 'byung ba ni shing t'a la'i tshad tsam gyi 'od zer 'phro'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-8: phung po ma yin pa ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku lus la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rgyang ring du 'gro ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-11: bcom ldan 'das de'i sku lus ni mtho tshad du khru brgyad cu rtsa brgyad par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-12: zhabs kyi 'og nas pus mo'i bar du khru nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-13: pus mo nas lte ba'i bar du khru nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-14: lte ba nas sgrog rus kyi bar du khru nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-15: sgrog rus nas spyi gtsug gi bar du khru nyi shu rtsa gnyis so; ;dpung pa gnyis kyi bar du khru nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-16: sgrog rus re re'i kyus ni khru lnga lnga'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-17: snyan gnyis kyi rtse mo nas rtsa ba'i bar la khru bdun bdun no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-18: spyan re re'i mchu ru khru lnga lnga'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-19: smin ma gnyis kyi dkyus su khru lnga lnga'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-20: smin ma gnyis kyi dbus kyi bar zheng la khru lnga'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-22: ya mchu ma mchu gnyis kyi mchu ru khru bcu bcu'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-23: ljags kyi bzlums su khru lnga'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418a-25: gser gyi me long dang 'dra ba'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la khru nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-0: @418b phyag gnyis kyi ring du khru bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-1: de ni 'di bzhin du dpe med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpal mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rol pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-2: stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khor yug thams cad kyi lha rnams dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-3: de'i rjes su mi rnams kyi nang du gnas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-5: bye ba 'bum phrag gcig gi lha dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-7: chos kyi dang po thob pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-8: chos kyi dang po ma thob pa rnams mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-9: de ltar mchog dang ldan pa'i byams pa su zhig gis mi mthong /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-10: nga ni ma bsad pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-12: dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-13: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-14: mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-16: byang chub kyi shing bcad pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-17: byang chub sems dpa' bsad pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-18: dge 'dun gyi kha zas brlag par byas pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-19: shin tu ser sna che ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-20: log par lta ba nges pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-21: 'phags pa'i gang zag la skur pa 'debs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-23: de rnams kyis mi mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-24: tshigs bcad stong phrag gcig gis so sor brgyan pa 'di thams cad sgrol gyi skyes rabs chen po nyi ma gcig la skye bo rnams kyis bshad pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:418b-26: mar me stong phrag gcig gam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-1: gcig gi me tog phul pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-2: stong phrag gcig gi autpa la sngon po'i me tog gam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-4: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs byed pa'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-5: de la mchod pa byed pas ni byams pa sangs rgyas pa'i dus su /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-6: de'i drung du dang po'i chos thob ces skye bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-7: sems can lhag ma rnams kyis sbyin pa byin pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-9: gtsug lag khang sbyangs pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-10: byang chub kyi shing bskrun pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-13: byang chub kyi shing la rim gro byas pa dang; skyed mos tshal bskrun pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-18: bstan pa'i bya ba byas pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-19: chos kyi gnas la byi dor byas pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-21: phreng ba la sogs pas mchod par byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-22: gus par byas nas chos mnyan pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-23: kha zas tsam gyi sbyin pa dge 'dun la gtong ba dang; pha dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-24: ma la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-25: rigs kyi gtso bo la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-26: gso sbyong la gnas pa la kha zas ster ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-27: glo bur ba'i btsun pa la sbyin pa ster ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-28: bsod snyoms pa la ster ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419a-29: stan 'bul ba'i skye bos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-0: tha na me tog snyim pa @419b gang tsam mam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-2: gzhan bsod nams byed pa rnams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-4: mi rnams kyi dge ba 'di rnams byed pa ni /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-5: de'i dus su byon pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-6: de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mthong bar 'dod pa rnams kyis sbyin pa gtong pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-8: gso sbyong gi las byed pa sgom par byed pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-9: dge ba'i las kyi bag yod par gyur na gdon mi za bar mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-10: gang zhig tshangs par spyad pa spyod //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-11: thub pa'i gsung rab thos pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-12: de rnams 'khor ba las grol zhing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-13: bla med mchog gyur 'chi ba med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-14: tshangs par spyad pa spyod byed cing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-15: mchod 'os rnams la ster ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-16: gso sbyong rnams la gnas pa dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-17: legs par byams pa bsgom par gyis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-18: bag yod par ni 'gyur ba dang //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-19: rtag tu bsod nams bya ba byed //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-20: dge ba 'di rnams byas pa yis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-21: sdug bsngal mthar ni byed pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-23: dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:419b-25: pandi ta chen po a'annta shr'i'i zhal snga nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:420a-0: mang du thos pa'i lo tstsha ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan @420a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:420a-2: skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-023:420a-3: sa steng du nyi ma dang /
